original_text: And the pride of Israel doth testify to his face: therefore shall Israel and Ephraim fall in their iniquity: Judah also shall fall with them.
korean_text: 이스라엘의 교만이 그 얼굴에 드러났나니 그 죄악으로 말미암아 이스라엘과 에브라임이 넘어지고 유다도 그들과 함께 넘어지리라

sentences.original_text: And pride of Israel doth testify to his face:
therefore shall Israel and Ephraim fall
Judah also shall fall with them.
